Description:
Exception is thrown out when preview the data set result.

Build number: 
2.3.0.v20071123-0800

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report sample data set with query: 
select CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.ORDERDATE, CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.ORDERNUMBER from CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS where CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.ORDERDATE='2003-01-10'.
2. Select the data set and switch to Script tab, input:
this.queryText=this.queryText+" union select CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.ORDERDATE, CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.SHIPPEDDATE, CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.ORDERNUMBER from CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS where CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.SHIPPEDDATE='2003-01-10'"
   in "beforeOpen".
3. Preview Results.

As quoted by the exception, "
SQL error #1: The number of columns on the left and right sides of the UNION
must be the same.", this is not a valid sql query.

If set the query to "select CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.ORDERDATE, CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.ORDERNUMBER from
CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS where CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.ORDERDATE='2003-01-10' union select CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.SHIPPEDDATE, CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.ORDERNUMBER from
CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS where CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.SHIPPEDDATE='2003-01-10'", result can be previewed without exception. Reopen.

update report design

To make the report run as you expected, you can modify the script text as follows: 
this.queryText=this.queryText+" union select CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.SHIPPEDDATE as ORDERDATE, CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.ORDERNUMBER from CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS where CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.SHIPPEDDATE='2003-01-10'"

This similar behavior can make the report work properly. And we do not support the operation in your description.
